prompt.description: A text description of the desired image. The maximum length is 4000 characters.

size.description: The size of the generated images

quality.description: The quality of the image that will be generated. `hd` creates images with finer details and greater consistency across the image.

style.description: The style of the generated images. Vivid creates images that are hyper-realistic and dramatic. Natural creates images that are more natural and less hyper-realistic.
